statements: SELECT device_id, status, last_checked, maintenance_record FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT status, device_id, maintenance_record, last_checked FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT status AS device_status, device_id AS id, last_checked AS checked_time, maintenance_record AS record FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT device_id, status FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'Online';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT device_id, status FROM edge_device_health WHERE last_checked > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT device_id, status, maintenance_record FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'inactive' AND last_checked < '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(device_id), status FROM edge_device_health GROUP BY status HAVING COUNT(device_id) > 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, health_status, last_check_time FROM edge_device_health_status;
SELECT health_status, device_name, last_check_time, device_id FROM edge_device_health_status;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, health_status FROM edge_device_health_status WHERE health_status = 'Critical';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health_status WHERE health_status = 'OK';
SELECT device_name, last_check_time FROM edge_device_health_status ORDER BY last_check_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, health_status FROM edge_device_health_status WHERE device_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM edge_device_health_status AS edhs JOIN maintenance_records AS mr ON edhs.device_id = mr.device_id WHERE mr.maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health_status WHERE health_status = 'Warning' AND last_check_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT device_name, status, last_update FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT device_name, last_update FROM edge_device_health WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, location, last_maintenance FROM device_locations WHERE last_maintenance < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'online' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT device_name, status, last_update FROM edge_device_health WHERE device_id = 10;
SELECT device_id, location, last_maintenance FROM device_locations WHERE device_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY last_maintenance ASC;
SELECT device_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%repair%' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'offline' AND last_update < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, health_status FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_name, health_status, last_maintenance_date FROM edge_devices WHERE health_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM edge_devices INNER JOIN device_locations ON edge_devices.device_id = device_locations.device_id;
SELECT * FROM edge_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM edge_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM device_locations GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT device_id, MAX(log_timestamp) AS latest_log_timestamp FROM device_logs GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health;
SELECT device_name, status, last_checked FROM edge_device_health WHERE status='active';
SELECT device_id, location_name, address, city, country FROM location WHERE city='New York';
SELECT device_id, issue_type, description FROM device_issues ORDER BY reported_on DESC;
SELECT device_id, power_consumption, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM device_stats WHERE power_consumption > 100;
SELECT * FROM edge_device_health WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_checked FROM edge_device_health ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, status, last_checked FROM edge_device_health WHERE alert_threshold > 50 ORDER BY last_checked ASC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location WHERE city = 'New York' OR city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT device_id, issue_type, description FROM device_issues WHERE reported_by LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY reported_on DESC;
